about_the_game:
Dive into a dungeon of 50 floors teeming with countless monsters.

Gather items and use your special stealth abilities to reach the deepest part, the hidden garden.



Each attempt presents a new challenge as the dungeon's layout and item placements change.

As you descend, the difficulty escalates with each floor.

Mind the time limit, and carefully avoid troublesome monsters.

Make sure to collect essential items and adapt your strategy to the situation.

With enough practice, conquering all 50 floors is within your grasp.

Feedback from Players Who Reached the 50th Floor


  • The sense of accomplishment upon reaching the 50th floor in this game is immeasurable. Once you get the hang of it, you can complete it in about 30 minutes.
  • At first, I thought this game was unreasonable and impossible to beat. However, just by figuring out the right timing to use items, I realized it was actually easy to conquer.
  • As you progress through the floors, new items, gimmicks, and enemies appear, adding a high level of strategy that is really enjoyable. This game clearly offers more value than its price, and I’ve played it many times.

name: Mutable 50

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support Direct3D 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support Direct3D 11 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Explore a 50-floor dungeon crawling with countless monsters. Collect items and use your special stealth abilities to reach the deepest part of the labyrinth.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
